constantValues: An order or request for both supply of the medication and the instructions for administration of the medication to a patient.

definitions.description: An order or request for both supply of the medication and the instructions for administration of the medication to a patient.

members.name: dispenseRequestNumberofRepeatsAllowed

constantValues: Dispense Request Number of Repeats Allowed
An integer indicating the number of times, in addition to the original dispense, (aka refills or repeats) that the patient can receive the prescribed medication.

members.displayName: Dispense Request Number of Repeats Allowed
members.description: An integer indicating the number of times, in addition to the original dispense, (aka refills or repeats) that the patient can receive the prescribed medication.

foreignKeyAttribute.name: dispenseRequestPerformer

constantValues: Indicates the intended dispensing Organization specified by the Prescriber.

foreignKeyAttribute.description: Indicates the intended dispensing Organization specified by the Prescriber.

members.name: dispenseRequestQuantity

constantValues: The amount that is to be dispensed for one fill.

members.description: The amount that is to be dispensed for one fill.

members.name: dispenseRequestValidityPeriodEndDate

constantValues: Dispense Request Validity Period End Date
This indicates the validity period of a prescription (stale dating the Prescription).

members.displayName: Dispense Request Validity Period End Date
members.description: This indicates the validity period of a prescription (stale dating the Prescription).

members.name: dispenseRequestValidityPeriodStartDate

constantValues: Dispense Request Validity Period Start Date
This indicates the validity period of a prescription (stale dating the Prescription).

members.displayName: Dispense Request Validity Period Start Date
members.description: This indicates the validity period of a prescription (stale dating the Prescription).

members.name: expectedSupplyDuration

constantValues: Identifies the period time over which the supplied product is expected to be used, or the length of time the dispense is expected to last.

members.description: Identifies the period time over which the supplied product is expected to be used, or the length of time the dispense is expected to last.

members.name: groupIdentifier

constantValues: A shared identifier common to all requests that were authorized more or less simultaneously by a single author, representing the identifier of the requisition or prescription.

members.description: A shared identifier common to all requests that were authorized more or less simultaneously by a single author, representing the identifier of the requisition or prescription.

members.name: identifier

constantValues: This records identifiers associated with this medication request that are defined by business processes and/or used to refer to it when a direct URL reference to the resource itself is not appropriate
